original_text: Paul and Barnabas heard that these people wanted to hurt them. So they left Iconium quickly and they went to Lystra and Derbe, and other places near there. These cities were in the region called Lycaonia.
korean_text: 그들이 알고 도망하여 루가오니아의 두 성 루스드라와 더베와 그 근방으로 가서

sentences.original_text: that these people wanted to hurt them
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 그들을 해치려 한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and they went to Lystra and Derbe

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 근처 다른 곳들로도 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: These cities were in the region
